title: SyntaxError: unparenthesized unary expression can't appear on the left-hand side of '**'
summary: The JavaScript exception "unparenthesized unary expression can't appear on the left-hand side of '**'" occurs when a unary operator (one of typeof, void, delete, await, !, ~, +, -) is used on the left operand of the exponentiation operator without parentheses.
short_title: SyntaxError: unparenthesized unary expression can't appear on the left-hand side of '**'

parents.title: SyntaxError: unparenthesized unary expression can't appear on the left-hand side of '**'
